website_summaries.verdict: Versatile kit that works easily with many other devices. Uses LED display to provide information.
pros: Offers 2 USB ports so 1 can be used for charging at any time
Sharp LED screen ensures you can adjust settings accurately
Fairly easy to set up and use
Impressive results considering its price tag
cons: Makes use of older Bluetooth 3.0 version
May not last as long as others

customer_reviews.title: Works As Described
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that has bluetooth capability so I could listen to music from my phone. My 2000 Acura TL only has a cd player and tape deck- unfortunately. Glad I purchased this item for thr car. Works as described. You just need to find the right station to get clear sound. But there will be a few areas that will cause a little bit of interference while you drive. So it won't be perfect all the time.
customer_reviews.author: XDIPNDOTSX

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device, with Aux output
customer_reviews.text: Excellent transmitter and mp3 player. I tried another brand, but settled on this one because a) I like the display screen, and b) I really wanted the AUX output. My car has an AUX input, so this device connects easily and simply, with better audio than going through FM. The display screen is not great -- the song titles are hard to read -- but it's OK, and it's certainly better than nothing. Plus, at this price point, I wasn't expecting a smartphone-quality display. Also, my device included a card that gave me an 18-month warranty, as long as I registered on the Nulaxy website.
customer_reviews.author: Costero

customer_reviews.title: Are you looking for a bluetooth transmitter? - GET THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I had big expectations from this little gadget and it exceeded all my expectations. It was extremely easy to set up, literally selected the channel and that was it. It is extremely quick to pair with my iPhone 7 and stays connected. Volume control comes in very handy, I have it mounted by my gear stick. It's like this company thought about everything when designing this product, it features USB flash drive, memory card option, power out to phones/ tablets/ portable battery banks/ USB light/ USB fan or any 5v gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I love it--And I'm pretty Picky
customer_reviews.text: I am picky about audio. (It started decades ago when as a college student I sold high-end audio equipment in a retail store.) I say that because I detest the distortion and limited frequency response. I was blown away by this thing. Unlike so many FM transmitters and Bluetooth devices, this one has excellent frequency response and as best as my picky ears can tell, very low distortion. Bluetooth pairing to my iPhone is fast and easy. My only nit is that the unit appears to be drifting in frequency when it's left in a very hot car. But I would absolutely buy this thing again. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard K. Skoch

customer_reviews.title: the product came in perfect condition package very well the only reason I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: The transmitter came on time :) I returned it though nothing to do with the product.. the product came in perfect condition package very well the only reason I returned it was because I have my phone on a magnetic knob on the vent so it was interfering with my transfer. I gave it a 5×-star because the product came in perfect condition it was nothing wrong with it and I'm pretty sure if I would had moved the magnet that was holding my phone I'm positive that the transmitter would have work a 100%
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: could have gotten 5 star but have to give it one star
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this product a 4 or 5 star rating. But Unfortunately, I cannot because it broke. While it was functioning, it was fine. But as you can see the power tip came off completely leaving parts of it inside the car outlet. Which caused it to short out and blow a fuse out? Hopefully it was just a fuse and I will check that later. That, it did not. Melt the wiring to the outlet. If the seller reaches out to me and offers a free replacement, I will update this reviews to indicate.
customer_reviews.author: Fill

customer_reviews.title: Handy dandy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little thing. My car is older so it doesn't have bluetooth capability but, this gives it that. I love that I can listen to my podcasts and music rather clearly. Every once in a while if I'm in a place with a lot of interference, it gets a little staticy, but not much. It really sucks for taking calls though. I end up switching my phone over to speaker just so they can hear me and I can hear them better.
customer_reviews.author: AussieG

customer_reviews.title: I really love it.  Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. I really love this. So much better and easier to use then the one I had before. I was able to set it up within 5 minutes. I love the larger screen and ease of pushing the buttons. Two ports I can use to charge my and my husband's phone when we're in the car. The sound is great. Great price. I was happily surprised when I saw that it came with an 18 month warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance, with a few small problems.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good audio quality. Bluetooth and FM reception work perfectly. Decent controls, although choosing songs from a large memory stick is almost impossible. Only one real problem: USB charger port works only for a short time before it goes out. I can't rely on it to keep my phone charged. It's small, but oddly shaped to it's hard to find a spot where it fits. The goose-neck model might be a good option, though the controls on those don't seem as straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Dougo

customer_reviews.title: it's like the quality of actually having an AUX cable
customer_reviews.text: My car doesn't have a 3.5mm audio jack, nor does it have bluetooth -- I have no way to connect my phone to my car radio except through these FM transmitters. I've tried so many of these and most of them were $50+, this one out performs all of those. The music clarity is exceptional, the power behind this thing broadcasting is enough to eliminate all of the static on the station you're tuned to, it's like the quality of actually having a AUX cable. I highly suggest this product for anyone who wants music in their car when their radio doesn't have an input.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget at a great price. Perfect for older cars without a USB port. Be aware that when you first put it into the lighter thingy it will feel like it won't fit. Just make sure it's connectors are lined up and push gently but firmly until the lights on the Nulaxy go on. My only wish is that the numbers were smaller and the name of the song playing were larger
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I am keeping it
customer_reviews.text: The sound and transmission is great. I don't know about the Bluetooth features because I bought this for my wife specifically for the MP3 player with a micro card. She has an old car and the CD player does not work. However after reading the features of this device I am interested in using them. But this player cant play by album from the micro card, so in order for her to find the songs in an album she has to press the "previous" or "next" button dozens of times until she finds what she wants. And her hope was to have hundreds of song in the card.
customer_reviews.author: humdec

customer_reviews.title: I can live with it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this! I dont have an auxiliary plug not a tape player so this is exactly what I needed to be able to play music from my phone. The sound quality isn't that good, really staticky when u plug your phone to it, if u use bluetooth it's better. It's easy to set up. I cant see the screen from where I plug it in its leaning down so it can go into the plug, not an issue since I really dont need to see it... Wish the sound was better! Other then that it's great to have if u dont have the other hook ups.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Once I received this item , I was very excited. Although, as months past but the sound quality was the same anymore. It started to have static sound whenever you connected the device via Bluetooth. I have this device for a year now and it's just complete garbage. I have even tried connecting the device via aux cabel and it doesn't even work. Save your time and money. Look some where else.
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: Shaft too short for Subaru Legacy
customer_reviews.text: It looks like being a decent device. Unfortunately, I could not use it. I have a Subaru Legacy Wagon, and the cigarette lighter is located next to the ashtray, both covered by a lid which stays open at an angle. The transmitter's shaft is far too short to reach into the lighter.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best transmitter I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 3 transmitters before this one. This is honestly the best I have ever had. It actually reads many of the music files the others could not. Then they would shut off and make an annoying static noise. This one plays smooth and much clearer than the others. It saved me allot of money paying someone allot of money just to put in a 20 dollar stereo that does the same thing. I would recommend this to anyone definitely hands down the best I have had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wright

customer_reviews.title: Almost holding on to it for two years and it’s still working well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this wireless transmitter in multiple cars and it’s worked amazing for me for almost two years now and I am about to order a new one bc the hinges that kept the two parts together came out and so it’s hanging and while it still works, I’ll put it out if it’s misery and get a new one. The one problem I mainly have is that it takes 1-2 seconds to change the song when you do it on the transmitter. But that’s really it!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy installation and one quality transmitter receiver for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very well-built curated great value-for-money unbelievable. Easy to install and hooks to Bluetooth most immediately. I'm dealing with a 2006 BMW which has no USB Jax and no way to tap into the stereo. Instead of an upgrade I just bought one of these and problem solved. Instant access to my phone's music
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it actually works! My husbands car doesn't have Bluetooth or any new technology. I've been trying to find an easy solution that didn't require hard wiring at a stereo shop. This transmitter is super easy and works great! Simply plug it into the lighter, find a channel on your car radio that doesn't have a transmission and match the channel on the device, connect your phone via Bluetooth and your done! I'm amazed at how clear the sound has been. I'm guessing that if we traveled, we would have to change channels a few times as you hit different radio markets, but that's really a small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: MayberryInTheCity

customer_reviews.title: Have a couple frequency or stations programmed for when that Mexican radio station interferes
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent product that works as advertised. Keep in mind where your cigarette lighter is located. I drive a Ford truck and I have to turn it slightly to the right so it's not so close to other controls. This unfortunately makes reading the screen impossible. Using it in our little Mazda it makes using one of the cup holders useless . wish it was a little longer in the power connection end. When traveling around in the city of Atlanta , you will often pick up static, in heavy traffic you can't take your eyes off road and change channels which renders it useless so then your left turning Bluetooth off and just using your speaker phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Convenient size, Charging while streaming w/Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has a USB port on the side to keep my phone charged. My iPhone 7 connected easily, the radio station was easy to set and it stays in the memory of the device. (I have also set the radio station to memory in my car). I like that there is no audio cord you have to plug in running the risk of breaking it like the old RCA audio cassette converters. Easy to skip to next song or go back to last song. My daughter also used her Amazon music and linked it through Bluetooth on her Galaxy Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: K621H

customer_reviews.title: Same price as a charger with more functions.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I took a chance on this Bluetooth FM transmitter. I'm glad I did, now I can listen to music from my phone on my "old" AM/FM/CD radio and charge it from the same device. Or I can play music from a thumb drive. The two drawbacks I have are that the transmitted volume is pretty low (I listen at 8 for normal radio stations but at 22 for this transmitter) and that it doesn't have a sensor to shut itself off after my phone has disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: midockman

customer_reviews.title: Great until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this device. Worked well for a couple of months. But it broke after only a handful of uses. Will have to look in purchasing a more durable device
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works well, insert cylinder barely fits
customer_reviews.text: This device works really well, lets me connect my blue tooth phone to my ancient blue tooth deprived car radio. Only one problem: The width of the cylinder you insert into the cigarette lighter is slightly too wide, so I have to really shove it hard to get it to go in, and if I need to remove it, have to be careful not to rip the device in half as it's really difficult to pull out again. All other features are great, but seriously guys, cigarette lighter openings are a standard size - basic quality control!
customer_reviews.author: Neal McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Best I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nulaxy products for several years. After trying numerous other options, I have found Nulaxy to be the best of those that I have tried. The trick of course is to find an unused fm channel so that you get the clearest possible reception. If your radio has channels below 80, then these will likely be the clearest. I use 87.9.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older cars
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the tape in the tape player workaround for not having bluetooth connectivity in my older car. The sound was terrible. I saw this in a friend's car and it sounded great. He sent me the link and I bought one. At first it wouldn't connect to my phone. I thought it was because I had a Pixel and it's not compatible with a lot of things. I sent the support team an email. They responded very quickly. After doing what they told me a couple of times it finally worked. I was soooo excited!! This is such a great little toy.
customer_reviews.author: susanlee07

customer_reviews.title: My analog car is now a smart car.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how easy this was. All you need is a cell phone with Bluetooth, and any fm radio station will do. I wasn't sure about this product being that I was going for a very long road trip and the antenna to my FM radio had recently broke off but this still worked. I was able to take calls, use my navigation, and listen to my favorite podcasts and music with ease. The USB on the side also provided my cell phone with battery the entire trip. My analog car is now a smart car, and it was less than $20 thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Fotochiq

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad deal at all
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is far better than I expected, and features are extraordinary for this price range. Looks nice too. Still get static on any station though. It's fairly quiet. And the biggest con for me - it doesn't fit right in my car! The gooseneck one would have fit. 2006 mazda 6, the lighter is in a recessed area so I can only put this in sideways and even then the ports on the side are blocked.
customer_reviews.author: JustinA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but need to unplug it when car is not used
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my 2010 Ford F150 truck. I mounted it into the cigarette lighter and noticed that it is still one when the car engine is off. So one has to remember pulling it off every time that the car engine is turned off so that it will not drain the car's battery. Too inconvenient at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: George Z.

customer_reviews.title: She's Happy, I'm Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after doing some intensive research for my oldest Granddaughter who had just bought her first car. Her car was not bluetooth enabled and I wanted to provide a hands free situation for her. Well she loves it and it and she is able to stream her music from her phone to play through the car speakers as well as make and take calls through the car's speakers. Well worth it...She's happy, I'm happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Ancrum

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone with an older car
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my car is too old to have the built in Bluetooth connectivity, this plugs right into your cigarette lighter plug and is synced with a frequency( Example, on the transmitter pick an empty channel(98.3) and change your radio to that too, comment to Bluetooth and you’re set.) The only problem I have is that it’s kind of big, not a huge problem but would prefer for it to be smaller. Finally, it has a charging port, decent charging, pretty convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Burhan

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Causes static to all local radio stations if plugged in though even if you aren't on the desired channel.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months. Works well but has trouble auto connecting sometimes which is a pain but I can't blame it on the unit, Bluetooth is a constantly changing technology with phones getting new profile updates every time they come out. You need to sync it probably 7 times out of 10 as it won't auto sync.
customer_reviews.author: H7nter

customer_reviews.title: Works well but won't reconnect.
customer_reviews.text: This transmitter has excellent quality and it is powerful enough to transmit over weak stations. The problem is it won't reconnect with my Galaxy S5. If my S5 is out of range for more than a minute, I have to manually go into Settings, Bluetooth, and select KM19 to reconnect it. The idea was to replace my old device that had a cable with a wireless device. Since I have to manually reconnect this device every single time, I might as well have stayed with my old device.
customer_reviews.author: TopDownFit

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product for Someone with an Older Automobile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so I could connect my iPhone to my automobile's speakers. Although it does not sync with the phone as well as my other Bluetooth enabled automobile, it is suitable for my purposes. It is also very helpful that it has a USB charging port. However, I do not believe that some of the devices' other features, such as its ability to accept a USB flash drive or MicroSD card with music files, are particularly helpful, at least for someone like me who has his music on a smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Donawick

customer_reviews.title: FAT format for flash drives, and tuning to a truly blank frequency
customer_reviews.text: After reformatting a flash drive (this transmitter reads only FAT file systems, not NTFS), this works fine for playing music from the drive. I had to reset the frequency a couple of times, but I finally found one that was truly clear, and there was minimal buzz. It seems like the closer a frequency is to getting transmission bleed, the more static or buzz there will be. The bluetooth pairs well with my Android phone, and it takes calls with good clarity. It's a bit squirrelly with outgoing calls -- I haven't got it to work yet, despite trying what I think are all the options.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My state just went to mandatory hands free calling & this KM19 FM Transmitter has updated my 16 year old car audio system to a 2020 system. I can make & receive calls hands free through my radio with great sound clarity. I can listen to my favorite music with the Amazon Music app or with music saved on a USB flash drive or a micro SD Card. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: The part that connects to my car charger was larger ...
customer_reviews.text: The part that connects to my car charger was larger in size and it ended up breaking my car charger port when i tried to take it out.
customer_reviews.author: cskumaran

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic, sounds like heaven
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2000 Ford Ranger with stock stereo/cd player. Rather than ripping it out and installing a $200+ stereo system, I chose this little bluetooth magician to do the heavy lifting. Works perfectly, pairs instantly, and lets me make and take calls hands-free. Buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Sounding BT Transmitter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Bluetooth receiver, no complaints here! Consistently re-connects automatically when you start your car, sound output is fantastic via aux cable (I’ve never used the radio transmission connection). The USB port charges as fast as any other, and the unit looks cool and futuristic!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Johns

customer_reviews.title: Love this device!! Wish I had bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and it took about a minute to set up. Instructions were easy to understand and set up was easy. My car doesn’t have an aux jack and I stopped paying for Serius. This device is exactly what I was looking for to play Spotify from my phone in my car. The sound is really clear and the display is easily read. I like that it’s flexible because I drive an 05 Accord and the cigarette lighter has a pop-up cover that would have otherwise been in the way, but it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it talks to me
customer_reviews.text: When I start the car, it looks for my phone with no prompting and tells me when it is hooked up and ready to go. I do like the quality so far. no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: hackfoo

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It is a little tricky to plug in
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for over a year. Works great. It is a little tricky to plug in. It can be difficult to remove. I place it in the plug outlet inside my arm rest so that I don't have to constantly remove it or potentially damage the device or my car. If you are not worried about it being seen your car then you don't have to remove it. It will also charge your phone while you're using the bluetooth connection. But if you are charging it and using your phone for music and gps your phone battery will not charge but drain.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth connection for music from Android device worked good.
customer_reviews.text: Played music through blue tooth while driving around and also USB port keeping phone from running down. Works good. Only problem is u get a phone call and forget it has auto connected it won't come out the phone speaker at first. Had to push some button. Would be better if for phone used blue tooth and phone speaker both so don't have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This device is the best on the the market
customer_reviews.text: This device is the best on the the market. It does exactly what it is supposed to do and the sound is by far the best among its peers. It is simple to use but has a littLe problem with the Bluetooth cutting off sometimes in theidle of conversations. On the whole this little device works better than most. It make a great gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shalom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound for the price. Every once and a while you can hear a humming but it is not bad and you can steam music all day. I drive 12 Hrs a day and I love being able to get commercial free music in my work vehicle. Try it out, if you don’t like it your only out $18.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth !
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't beleive how Dam Good ( Sorry ) but worked fine. I pluged it my electric car cooler house adapter thinking why wouldn't it do house stereo and Wow !!!! had bout 400 watts coming though that little thing. Been wondering how Or If could B tooth my big ol inside stereo. $16.99. Got the Amazon BOSS 600 watts on my Bike....motorcycle and this in my Silverado and House....SET !!!!! Thanks All.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Watts Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a Bluetooth device this is the one. It connects to my phone (iPhone) automatically when I get into the car and the best part is the reception is excellent. I am officially free of wires all over the place. PL
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. Simple, easy to use. Holds the radio stations better than my corded one did with no static. I have a cubby right above my power outlet and this swivels right out of the way when I need it too. It also looks sharp and fits the outlet very tightly. It has a 6 month warranty on it. Even if it craps out after that I will have definitely gotten my $20 bucks out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought something similar to this and it was terrible. I really didnt want to get a new CD player/Radio installed, so I tried again. So far this has been perfect, the sound is clear through the radio no matter where I am. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Cheez

customer_reviews.title: Versatility and Value
customer_reviews.text: This device has saved me from having to replace the center auxiliary component on my car! The display is crystal clear and the functionality is superb! It takes micro SD memory cards and/or the use of an aux cord, which comes with it! You can also plug in a jump drive. Truly versatile and portable from vehicle to vehicle!!! For the price of this product, you cannot beat the value of it!!! The best of plug and play technology!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rios

customer_reviews.title: Well I am very happy with it know I don't have to spend more ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Tahoe and my son was going to get me a new radio for it with USB and Bluetooth, but I was searching in amazon and found this FM transmitter and divided to try it out. Well I am very happy with it know I don't have to spend more for a new radio this one is perfect I am enjoying it. My daughter asked me how I was lisining to my phone on my radio if it didn't have Bluetooth and when I showed her she liked it and said she was going to order one for her. I am happy with it....
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Love this hands-free
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this because my husband bought one at a truckstop by our house and loves it. I've needed a hands-free for quite some time and this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Quick Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this back July of 2018, so almost 2 yrs and it’s still working the same as when I first installed it. Sounds nice and never had any problem connecting to Bluetooth. Less than $20 and well worth it. I would buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Melmo

customer_reviews.title: good, recommended
customer_reviews.text: I really like this one. I have been using it for two years. Only issue is that it is not flexible and in my van 12-volt is far down below and it is difficult to use button on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad N.

customer_reviews.title: An FM transmitter that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few other FM transmitters before I bought the KM19 and had decided that my car stereo was the problem. The KM19 quickly showed me that my decision was flawed. This piece of equipment saved me from having to buy an aftermarket CD player with an auxiliary input. I literally can’t believe how clear the sound quality is. The large screen is bright and easy to see. It is so easy to use and it comes with an 18 month warranty! If you have been disappointed by other FM transmitters before, give this one a chance to blow your mind. I will be looking for Nulaxy products first in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: frequent disconnection from bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for 2013 g37x, I had to use the charger inside the arm rest compartment, won't fit in the one outside. So i had to open the compartment everytime to track back or fwd. And frequent disconnection from bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: IFTEKER JAIGIRDER

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a Bluetooth music player to your car radio...but that's it
customer_reviews.text: This unit seems like it was better than the KM18, but it still has it's own issues. Unless you have this close to your face, you need to yell for someone to hear you. Works fine as a Bluetooth music player to your car radio if that's all that you need it for. I would not recommend for voice calls unless it's an emergency. I would opt for a Bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: mreservices

customer_reviews.title: Great FM transmitter
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that, now my old car has Bluetooth!! I was able to connect it to my phone easily. Tested by switching OFF the car and then turning it back ON and reconnecting the Bluetooth. Worked flawlessly. I have not tested all the other features it supports. But for what I need, it worked perfectly. I choose 92.9 FM frequency (there was no other FM channel with strong signal next to it). The audio sounds crystal clear to my ears.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for road trips; a bit soft volume
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and no issues with use or Bluetooth connection. It does tend to be on the softer side of radio transmitting and not sure why. Otherwise, it was perfect for our cross country road trip to play music, podcasts, audiobooks, etc. from my iphone
customer_reviews.author: K High

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product
customer_reviews.text: I use for my car radio, to connect my phone and play my music. I like all it's features and capabilities in terms of how many ways I am able to connect my devices. I will say that there isn't a channel I've found yet that doesn't have a little statistic in the background. Some stations are worse then others. And the Nulaxy has a tendency to randomly disconnect forcing me to unplug the device and reconnect it. It isn't often at all but it CAN be challenging to do while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I spent years listening only to CDs or the radio in my car when I could've been using this gem to listen to Spotify while driving. After setting up the bluetooth connection my phone syncs immediately when I get in the car, and I love being able to use it without the hassle of an aux cord. The phone charging feature is a huge bonus. I have no issues with static-y music.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great transmitter
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to buy this transmitter because the vehicle we had only connected to Apple products. It worked great. No static what so ever. It automatically connects each time. Would recommend to anyone who wants to stream music in a car that may not be compatible with their devices.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Just got today.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and everything that I have wanted. The microphone is very limiting though. It is not the best, so if in call is what youre buying it for; this is not the product for you. If you want to listen to your music through Bluetooth, or AUX; this is most certainly the product for you. I think the product is sturdy, but I see a alot of reviews about it breaking. If that happens I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Selouani

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. It's a static mess and the worst sound quality. Spend a little more and get one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This transmitter worked great for about a month. Then it started to weaken and I had to turn up my volume on the radio to hear music through it. Then it died completely. Of course this all happened while I was on vacation, driving long-distances and wanted to hear my playlists. I can no longer hear anything transmitted for the device. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Iannelli

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The gadget works fine, in all aspects, I think, it has a little noise on high volume, not too bad, probably because of interferance with other radio signals. Almost all of the frequencies are taken in my city, so its hard to get a "clean spot" on the signal band on the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Perez Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for a month, but a month later the Aux port doesn't work anymore. Must have been a faulty unit, company reached out to me and provided a new unit that works great. Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE - this product is much smaller than I expected and works super well - I've been pleasantly surprised especially since it's is so reasonably priced. The only annoying part is that the display isn't super bright, so when it's sunny it's hard to read whether it's connected. However, I rarely need to look at it since it automatically reconnects to my phone. Also, this transmitter goes to 87.9 - many don't and I never have to change the station to get clear reception even on long car rides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant, but extremely happy I did!
customer_reviews.text: I found this transmitter a year ago but decided against it. Recently a friend told me about their transmitter that worked better then the factory Bluetooth in her suburban so I figured I'd give it a try. So glad I did! Easy set up and works like a million bucks! It was a little difficult to get it to fit in my 99 Ford Expedition but I managed. I'll be sharing this link with my friends & family. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Parker

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth & cable connection conflict
customer_reviews.text: Only thing dislike: When connecting a device through the cable input, the bluetooth feature doesn't work. For example, while listening to IPOD through cable connection, the bluetooth phone connection is inoperable, i.e. an incoming call does not override the music playing through IPOD. It does work properly if listening to Pandora through the phone & a call comes in. Work around by disconnecting the IPOD & reactivating bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for a in dash plug. If your plug ...
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for a in dash plug. If your plug is in the console area facing the driver it will work okay. If the plug is facing any other direction you wont be able to see the display screen. The device doesn't swivel enough for adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Mrray

customer_reviews.title: Ok not the best
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works. I tried multiple stations but always seemed to have a high pitch back ground noise .
customer_reviews.author: The Merinos

customer_reviews.title: Works great for music and calling
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Works great for music and calling, just make sure you have enough space around your cigarette lighter port for it. It's a little cramped in her car and theres just barely enough room to access the USB. If space is an issue, get the model that extends out.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when making this purchase. I must say I was surprised how well this worked. The set up was easy. I'm able to make phone calls which were surprisingly very clear. The person on the other end had no problem hearing me. I also had no problem listening to music on my phone using Bluetooth. Loved it so much I purchased another one for my husband's car.
customer_reviews.author: hgreene

customer_reviews.title: Best voice ever! Oh yea, and the products top notch.
customer_reviews.text: "Waiting for pairing." "Paired." Best part of turning the car on is listening to the voice you picked to let me know you're paired. I literally laugh out loud almost every time. I wish I could use that voice to replace Ms Goog's nagging navigation or Siri's whiny banter. Cheers for making a well made product and going the extra mile. I just wish you'd talk to me more.
customer_reviews.author: Sulligraph

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal!  Two years and going strong!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Nice and loud and pulls in weak stations very well. Had it for two years and now going to buy as gifts for those with non-Bluetooth vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Boesche

customer_reviews.title: A good alternative
customer_reviews.text: I've got an older vehicle so this saved me a few hundred bucks instead of getting a new stereo.
customer_reviews.author: David Reed Watson

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is alright and I do like it, but don't expect it to last more than a year. I took very well care of mine and still developed issues. It does the job and it's cheap so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: tea710

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Very little static during audio playback, the mic isn’t the greatest for calls though. The volume knob became difficult to turn after the first few days. After a month and a half of use it died suddenly. Edit: Seller reached out after seeing my issue and sent a replacement. Rating changed from 2 stars to 4. Would be 5 if call quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but stopped working on the second use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this Bluetooth FM transmitter, i bought it because i saw a lot of good reviews but it only worked the first time , next time when i started the car it didn't connect automatically, i had again pair it with my phone but it never pair anymore, I don't know if i got a faulty device but it just doesn't work no more.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Mezquita

customer_reviews.title: 😮 wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little thing don't know how I got so softest thing it does interfere with radio stations when it's plugged in but other than that it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mistah J

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and remove. Easy connection to my I phone and programmed music. Connects easily to spotify.
customer_reviews.author: Carolann Masturzo

customer_reviews.title: Best FM transmitter out there with very nice screen
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic , you won’t be disappointed, I absolutely love it. Won’t buy any other but this one and I’ve gone through 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Энди фокс

customer_reviews.title: ... tooth FM transmitter for the last few weeks and love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Wireless blue tooth FM transmitter for the last few weeks and love it so far. Far superior then other FM transmitters I have used in the past. Screen is bright and interface is easy to read and control. Performs as designed with very little static if any heard once audio begins to play. I plan to buy another for use my wife's vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: G. S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for music!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mic for Bluetooth cell phone, could be better, but I would buy it again, if needed one more!
customer_reviews.author: JP Martin

customer_reviews.title: A great hands free option!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Easy to use, easy to set up. Connects to my phone each time I get in. Makes a great hands free option in an older vehicle or one not equipped with that option. Hands free calls work great, although sometimes I have to turn the volume up from where I had it for music, but beyond that, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tackittiv

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, don't even think twice
customer_reviews.text: This product works flawlessly, I am so amazed how solid this transmitter is I have tried multiple brands for twice the price as this and nothing has come anything close to this. Just make sure you have enough room to see the screen if you want to see it, doesn't effect how it works and don't really need to see the screen when its running. It pairs so quickly with my phone when the car turns on and all the buttons work as they should on it. I would recommend this to anyone who is considering this product
customer_reviews.author: Ryland Chin

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This device is fantastic. Does everything as described. Connects automatically when I enter the car. My only complaint would be, the Music from the SD card resets after shuttting off the vehicle. (As opposed to picking up where it was when the you shut the car off). Not a big deal and I would reccomend it to anyone considering buying it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little gadget. I installed it in a 2007 Pontiac Vibe (same as Toyota Matrix) Simple to set up. Plugging it in was a little stiff, don't think I'd want to remove it too often. Then I paired it, set the FM station to 87.9, pressed play on my app and Boom! Working. Looks good, works good.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Creates blue tooth connection to my radio.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, it provides Bluetooth to my car radio. I can talk on my iPhone listen to directions and play tunes all because of this great item. Plug it in pair it with your smart phone and you are set.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaJ

customer_reviews.title: ... a 7 hour road trip and it worked out great! I did not use it to place or ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 7 hour road trip and it worked out great! I did not use it to place or receive any phone calls but being able to connect my iPhone via Bluetooth and stream music and podcasts to the stereo of the car we borrowed worked flawlessly. It only took about a minute to set up and we didn’t have to change the frequency settings once the whole way to and from. This was much easier and MUCH cheaper than buying a new stereo unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great solution for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used several of these and this is my favorite one. It is easy to change channels and still allows me to charge my phone while using. The sound is good and I can move from car to car or RV
customer_reviews.author: Wendy and Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: At least they stand behind their product. My first transmitter died after only a few hours of use and I was understandably upset. I was contacted by Lindsay, offering me a free replacement. The new transmitter arrived a few days later and has been working, without issues, for the last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Romero

customer_reviews.title: Should be louder
customer_reviews.text: I play my music at volume number 30.. good songs 35. For phone calls I have to turn the radio volume up to 50 and can hear most of the what the caller is saying.
customer_reviews.author: D D.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with added benefits
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth radio transmitter is honestly amazing - the ones that I’ve bought previously never had a voltage meter and that was a huge plus since I drive an older car and I never know how much battery power I actually have until it’s too late. My music comes through super clear and there’s no static whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for sure
customer_reviews.text: My car doesn't have an aux port so this is perfect for me. Let's me listen to my spotify through my speakers since I don't have patience for radio commercials.
customer_reviews.author: Dropdeadred

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth Car FM Transmitter Audio
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bluetooth Car FM Transmitter Audio, it is easy to use and at excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Helmer Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Good Transmitter
customer_reviews.text: Good product work as described. Good quality. The only issue is the length of connector, is too short to use directly on cigarette outlet in front on my dashboard, I had to use the one that is down, Bluetooth is clear, once you paired, the device pairs with the phone automatically, crystal sound with used with Bluetooth to streaming music or used to listening music from USB memory. I Can charge my phone at same time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Arag.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to try this product due to bad experiences in the past but this device blows me away. It quickly connected to both my car and my phone with no issues and gave me crystal clear music on a long car ride as well as in Las Vegas where there are tons of radio stations. In addition the unit looks great in my truck and the device feels well built and of quality parts.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great 3rd party Bluetooth device
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to set up and looks and sounds great in my car. Does not give any static like I thought it would but that also depends on the channel you put it on because I’ve notice that some work better then others. Other then that I really like this product and have alreast bought 2 for my cars considering buying another one because my family likes to take it out my car and put it in there’s
customer_reviews.author: jose

product_meta.title: Nulaxy Bluetooth Car FM Transmitter Audio Adapter Receiver Wireless Handsfree Voltmeter Car Kit TF Card AUX USB 1.44 Display - KM19 Black
feature_bullets: Even better: Nullify KM19 updated with more Features. Now you are able to play music through the USB disk, TF card, Bluetooth and AUX cable
Compatibility: works on most devices on the market (Apple, Google, Huawei, Samsung, Sony and others)
Big LCD display: 1.44 inch screen to better visualize your phone calls, music, car battery voltage

TECHNOLOGY IN YOUR CAR: With our device you will add in your car: 1) Bluetooth connection; 2) Answer phone calls safely with the press of a button while driving; 3) Voltmeter function to control the quality of your car battery; 4) 4 different ways to play
Voltmeter function: safety when driving is our first concern, so we equip our devices with voltmeter. You can now check the car voltage before your trip or daily ride

specifications.Networking Feature: Travel, Portable, Outdoor, Automobiles, Microphone Feature
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,959 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
